availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Francis Landon Cleveland (Augusta, Kentucky, attorney and politician)

body.p: Augusta, Kentucky, attorney, teacher and politician. Ohio native. Married to Elizabeth Sarah McKibben Cleveland in Bracken County in April 1849. Married to Laura Cleveland. Father of James H. Cleveland. Teacher in 1850. Attorney in Augusta in 1860. Attorney in Bracken County in 1863. Member of the House of Representatives of the Commonwealth of Kentucky from 1859 to 1863. Member of the Senate of the Commonwealth of Kentucky from 1863 to 1867.
